org.gridgain.grid.cache.cloner
Class GridCacheBasicCloner

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.cache.cloner.GridCacheBasicCloner
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridCacheCloner
public class GridCacheBasicCloner
extends Object
implements GridCacheCloner

Basic cache cloner based on utilization of Cloneable interface. If a passed in object implements Cloneable then its implementation of Object.clone() is used to get a copy. Otherwise, the object itself will be returned without cloning.
